content: Thought this might be a useful stream to announce chat streams for Connectathon
The Workflow Track stream can be found here: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/workflow/subject/Connectathon
The CDS Hooks track stream is in the cds-hooks/Connectathon! stream
For anyone who's remote, there's a free webinar you can sign up to: https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/2952061551662191361

Unfortunately we didn't get it up and running until after the introductions, but at least you can now see and hear the room (and ask someone to come wave to you :>). As well, we'll use it to stream the presentation portion of tomorrow's session
SDC steam will be under this topic: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/implementers/subject/Structured.20Data.20Capture
Hi @Lloyd McKenzie is there a Webinar for Connectathon today?
